description.@en: We are weakest when we are alone, likely prey to the dark hunger of the world. I have found solace in my companions, a relief I did not know was possible. I dare not be without them, as to be alone is to be the next to die.

effect.@en: Select one player character at the start of every game session. Whenever you can see and hear them clearly, you ignore the effects of Stress. However, whenever you cannot see or hear them clearly, you treat all failed Resolve Tests to withstand Stress as if it were Fear instead.
